message: I understand you want to be fair, but I'm losing money each round. How about a 55/45 split?
I see you're eager to settle, but I'll meet you halfway between my original offer and yours
This is getting ridiculous, Alice.  Let's just split the difference of our last offers and call it a day. 52.5/47.5
You're losing value fast, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better offer, but don't wait too long
Alice, my offer is losing value fast. This is ridiculous.  Meet me halfway at 51.25/48.75 and let's end this.
You're bleeding value, Bob. I'll take a smaller step back, but it's time to get real
Alice, my offer is rapidly approaching worthless! I'm splitting the difference again at 50.625/49.375.  Take it or leave it - this is getting silly!
Bob, your share is almost worthless now. Take this or risk getting nothing
